metadata.name: Indicator Removal on Host - Clear Mac System Logs
metadata.comment: Detects deletion of local audit logs

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/rm')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/unlink')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/shred'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/var/log')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/users/')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/library/logs/'))))

output.summary: Detects deletion of local audit logs

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1070.002/T1070.002.md
